Replace.Text: grim reaper
Since the birth of Faith, every battle experienced +1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength, every time a unit is killed, it is changed to +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Soul-draining Blow
+1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength for each battle experienced
Soul-draining Blow
If a unit is killed in combat, it will be changed to +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
+1 [ICON_Strength] combat strength for each battle experienced. If the enemy is killed in battle, it will be changed to +3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
heavenly being
Civilian unit, can teleport between cities, can build all non-featured improvements, has high [ICON_Movement] mobility, high [ICON_Charges] labor, -3 [ICON_FAITH] faith per turn
The embodiment of hills and lakes
Hills +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, Lakes +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
The pinnacle of indigenous gods
All units of the player have permanent +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, this bonus will not disappear when the unit disappears; monuments +4 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
miracle god
Immediately obtain 150 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value, [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value; [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] encouragement effect increased by 10%
The Pilot of the Santu River

Give a Death God unit, its combat power will increase with the battles it has experienced, and it will be transferred to nearby cities when it is dying; if the Death God survives, each unit in the game will receive 16 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins due to battle death.
The helpless god of modeling
All cities gain 2 [ICON_Citizen] population, +3 [ICON_Housing] housing, and +2 [ICON_Amenities] amenity. Newly established cities also enjoy this effect.
The God of Ownerless Things
The culture bomb is triggered when the area construction is completed, each area +3 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, and the cost of purchasing units is -30%.
Secret God Flow
Floodplain +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith every time a flood is triggered.
Harvest and harvest, loneliness and finality
Farm +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, remove landscape and resource income increased by 40%
magatama craftsman
+4 [ICON_GOLD] gold for mines, +1 [ICON_Charges] labor for builders
Uncontrollable God's Fire

All cities have +32 [ICON_Power] power, Academy areas have +150% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology adjacency bonus and [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value adjacency bonus provide the same amount of [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity.
monster destroyer
+3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength, and an additional +7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting barbarians; +1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity for all cities when not at war with a major civilization
+3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength From Pantheon: Yokai Destroyer
A hard-working ordinary magician
+0.6 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science per population for all cities; if the city has a college, additional +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +0.6 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science per population
The goddess who brings trouble with words

All cities have -1 [ICON_Amenities] amenity. The negative amenity output debuff becomes a positive equivalent bonus (excluding population growth rate). If the amenity is less than or equal to -7, the bonus will be increased by an additional 10%.
Tengu scattering red leaves
All cities +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture, units ignore hills, woods, rivers [ICON_Movement] movement debuff
One-armed horned fairy

+40% holy land construction speed; when the holy land is adjacent to pasture or camp improvement facilities, you will permanently gain an additional 5 [ICON_FAITH] faith value area basic output (non-superimposable)
The daughter who neither wants nor wants to be in heaven
Give 2 Celestials (builders), unlock the project Celestial Ascension (the effect is -1 [ICON_Citizen] population of the city, get a Celestial unit, the Celestials will not be captured)
Ascension of the gods
The city has -1 [ICON_Citizen] population and gets a Celestial unit. Each Celestial will consume 3 [ICON_FAITH] Faith points each round.
Winter's forgotten things

Snow +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, frozen soil is halved; each area on snow +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology value +2 [ICON_FAITH] Basic output of faith value , frozen soil is reduced by half. and allow farms and mines to be built on snow and frozen soil
Not as good as Dosores
If the city is adjacent to the coast, +125% [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance
A contented old props shop
Commercial Center [ICON_GOLD] Gold adjacency bonus also provides the same amount of [ICON_CULTURE] culture, cities with banks +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes
Clairvoyance in the mountains
Scouting unit +7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength +3 vision, and vision can pass through the landscape
Clairvoyance in the mountains
+7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength +3 vision, and vision can pass through the landscape
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength From Pantheon: Clairvoyant of the Mountain
The little treasure hunter
Improved resources +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold coins +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith
The big wheel that protects and is protected
Cities adjacent to mountains gain +3 [ICON_CULTURE] culture and gain 100 points of city external defense
Trinitarian Rhapsody

The adjacent bonus of Holy Land, Academy, and Industrial Zone is -30%, but the adjacent bonus of each of the above areas provides the normal output type output of the other two areas equal to the normal adjacent bonus.
pure madness
Unit +8 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
+8 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Creed: Pure Fury
fantasy realm
Units gain +3 [ICON_Movement] movement when starting a turn within the country, city plot expansion speed +300%, and the capital gives all cities in the game +1 output of all types.
The ultimate absolute mystery
Each original area in the game has -1 adjacent bonus, and +3 equivalent output for the capital (including colleges, holy places, theaters, industrial areas, commercial centers, ports)
Closed eyes of love

Each [ICON_Citizen] population in the city +0.3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +0.7 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity, if the city does not reach 11 [ICON_Citizen] population, the above bonus is doubled
Hua Xu’s eternal sleep
Ignoring the requirements of mainstream religions, every time a unit dies in battle, the holy places in all your cities will be +5% [ICON_FAITH] Faith adjacent bonus
Penglai people
Each time you recruit a great person, +1% [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology value +1% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value +1% [ICON_FAITH] Total faith value output (maximum 30%)
The sealed great magician

Players who choose this creed: When the city meets all the following conditions, the capital will have +60% output of all types except food (has a temple, has at least 10 [ICON_Citizen] population, has a workshop, is adjacent to a mountain, has a garrison, has a market , in the golden age)
Angry Moon Rabbit
Accumulated war exhaustion increases by 150% compared to normal times, and all output increases by 10% when not at war with major civilizations.
A girl who is afraid even of evil spirits
The first [ICON_Envoy] envoy to all city-states is equivalent to 2 [ICON_Envoy] envoys, +4% [ICON_GOLD] gold coin output per city-state per clan leader
Beautiful Fei Zhiyi
+2 culture to [ICON_CULTURE] from each city-state's [ICON_Envoy] envoy
Destroyed Vajra Power
Melee units ignore city walls and have +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength, while ranged units have -7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength.
Destroyed Vajra Power
Ignores walls and +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Creed: Destruction
-7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Creed: Destruction
The girl with knowledge and escapism
All units -6 [ICON_Strength] combat strength; cities +20% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology +20% [ICON_CULTURE] culture
-6 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength The Girl from Creed: Knowledge and Escapism
The ever bright red baby moon
+10 influence; city +7% total influence
Devil's sister
Melee units ignore the damage debuff, gain +9 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when fighting with full health units, and recover 15 [ICON_Damaged] health points after winning the battle.
+7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength against full health units from Creed: Demon Sister
ghost band

Holy places and shrines +2 [ICON_GreatMusician] Great musician points, shrines +3 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] Musical masterpiece slots, musical masterpieces in the city +4 [ICON_CULTURE] Cultural values, musical masterpieces +300% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism performance (The slot ignores the mainstream religious needs of the city)
hell wheel

After selection, you will immediately get 4 [ICON_Envoy] envoys, and after the unit wins the battle, you will get [ICON_GOLD] gold coins and [ICON_FAITH] faith equal to 200% of the combat power of the killed unit.
Gift from the Flame Maolin
After winning the battle, you will receive [ICON_GOLD] gold coins and [ICON_FAITH] faith equal to 200% of the combat power of the killed unit.
Disciples of Bishamonten

Each city that meets the following conditions will produce [ICON_GOLD] gold coins equivalent to 12% of the [ICON_FAITH] faith output: the city has at least 7 [ICON_Citizen] people; the city has a shrine; the city has a temple; the city has a market.
Dark night monster
When in the Dark Ages, cities have +15 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +15 [ICON_FAITH] Faith.
little chinese girl
When the city has a garrison, +2 [ICON_Amenities] habitability +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value
The perfect and chic follower
Builder +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement +1 [ICON_Charges] Labor
Seven-colored puppet maker
Ignore the mainstream religious needs of the city, workshop +5 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +5 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value +2 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer Points
Heaven's Court Master
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for units; +1 Charisma for city tiles, and an additional +2 Charisma if you own a Holy Land
Nine-tailed tactician
The shrine will grant a random [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka
Reading reporter in easy chair
Gain full map vision, +1 [ICON_VisLimited] diplomatic visibility
The Half-Beast of Knowledge and History
Ignores mainstream religion requirements and increases the effectiveness of [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka by 1% and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration by 2% for each college owned
lucky white rabbit
God knows what the effect will be!
Super monster warhead
All areas of the city +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology value +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold coin base adjacent bonus
happy umbrella of oblivion
Units gain +4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when attacking and -3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending.
The gift of Tatara’s small umbrella
+4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when attacking, -3 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Creed: The Happy Umbrella of Oblivion
-3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength From Creed: The Happy Umbrella of Oblivion
The mind-bound spirit of a flood accident
All units can enter the deep sea after being launched into the water. Water transportation +2 [ICON_Movement] movement power, and +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when fighting naval units.
The gift of village yarn honey
After being launched into the water, you can enter the deep sea. Water transportation +2 [ICON_Movement] movement power, and +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when fighting naval units.
Ice spirit on the lake
If the city has a temple, +3 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity +9 [ICON_FAITH] faith value, -0.2 per [ICON_Citizen] population [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value output
big fairy
If the city has a temple, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] culture value +8 [ICON_FAITH] faith value
little devil
If the city has a temple, it will have +3 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value +4 [ICON_SCIENCE] scientific and technological value
Ominous black cat
If the city has a temple, +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity
The fairy who delivers spring
If the city has a temple and is located on a land with amazing charm value, +8 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture value +6 [ICON_FAITH] Faith value +8 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins
The light bug moving in the dark
If the city has a temple and the [ICON_Citizen] population is greater than or equal to 5, then +5 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +4 [ICON_FOOD] Food +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity
singing night sparrow
If the city has a temple, +4 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +3 [ICON_FOOD] Food +20% [ICON_GOLD] Gold coin output
scary well monster
If the city has a temple, -4 [ICON_FAITH] Faith +8 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity
A bright net in a dark cave
If the city has a temple, -25% population growth rate, +1 [ICON_Amenities] livability +20% [ICON_FAITH] faith value
Pantheon-MODDERS

This game mode adds more creeds based on the Eastern Pantheon, based on the modders of the Creative Workshop. Everyone has powerful beliefs, and their power is determined by the mods they make or their style of doing things. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Due to the different tendencies of AI, some of them may have been believed by AI early on, so you need to win these creeds as soon as possible. The benefits of each one are beyond your imagination. It can be said that there is no balance. The difference between the upper and lower limits is huge.
Dolphins that recast their glory

After completing the mining industry, the industrial zone is unlocked. When constructing the industrial zone and its buildings, +100% construction speed. The industrial zone will come with a +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity adjacency bonus. Each industrial zone will increase all the industrial zone buildings it owns. +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity Output
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Productivity comes from adjacent forests (Dolphins of Recast Glory)
Supermodel inside and outside - table
City +7 output of all types, but if it is the capital, only +4 output of all types
Supermodel inside and outside - inside
+100% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity when working on space program projects, gain 50 light years of progress each turn
LUA behind the scenes
+8 influence per round, each promotion of the Governor gives the city +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] +10% productivity [ICON_SCIENCE] Technology value
not so dark dark ages
If you are in the Dark Age, you will randomly receive an [ICON_CivicBoosted] boost at the beginning of each round.
Gua! ! ! Um? I super and we also have it!

All cities in the game will directly receive 500 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins. Cities that believe in this pantheon will receive an additional 250 [ICON_FAITH] faith. The above effects will also take effect on newly established cities.
pigeon pigeon duck

-15% population growth rate, unlock the project "Papie", this project can convert 100% of [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity into [ICON_GOLD] gold coins and [ICON_FAITH] faith during production, and 40% into [ICON_SCIENCE] technology and [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. Gives [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points each turn after completing one.
Painted cake

When producing this item, 100% of the [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity cost is converted into [ICON_GOLD] gold coins and [ICON_FAITH] faith, and 40% is converted into [ICON_SCIENCE] technology and [ICON_CULTURE] culture. Grants 50 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points each round after each completion.
Iron Fist Loli Bully Iron Fist
+100% construction speed when constructing the Municipal Square and its buildings; [ICON_Citizen] +75% for cities with a population of less than 4 [ICON_Tourism] Tourism performance
It’s hot every day

The first wonder built in the city will be completed at the speed of light. If the city already owns wonders, the construction speed will be increased by +200%; each owned wonder will obtain [ICON_GOLD] gold coins equivalent to 3% of the treasury each round.
